(Simplified: 浆)
Pictophonetic: 將 indicates the sound; 水 (water) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: The general gets sick of water and only drinks thick liquids like rum or whiskey.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the commander (將) has water (水) for a drink
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Water is good on a warm day, but on a cold one you need a hot thick liquid.  Try melting down your chocolate turtle, and sipping on that!
humanum_full_description_en:
from " water ", " will " sound, the original meaning is brewed sour drinks. " Pulp " is the ancient work " 𤖅 ", and also " 𤕯 ". "Said Wen": "𤖅, 酢𤖅 also. From the water, will save the sound. 𤕯, ancient prose 𤖅 province." "Zhou Li‧Tianguan‧Jiuzheng": "Distinguish the four drinking things: one is clear, the other is clear Medicine, the third is syrup, and the fourth is elixirs." Zheng Xuan's note: "The syrup, today's syrup is also." Sun Yirang Zhengyi: "The case is the same thing as the syrup, and if it is exhausted, it is called syrup. The cover is also brewed, but The taste is slightly tangy."

" Pulp " can mean juice. "Songs of the Chu: Recalling the Soul": "The turtle lamb, there is some pulp." Wang Yi's note: "Take the juice of the potato cane to drink it."

" Pulp " also means water or other food soups. Jin Gao Zhongchang "Poverty Ye Le": "Huang Ai Chi Ri Chang'an Road, the tired guest has no horses and grass.

" Pulp " also means that the clothes are washed, soaked in rice juice, and dried to make them flat. "Journey to the West" Chapter 48: "Don't worry, sizing clothes with us and drying Guan Wen."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " water ", " will " sound, the original meaning is brewed sour drinks.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「將」聲，本義為釀製的酸味飲品。「漿」古作「𤖅」，又作「𤕯」。《說文》：「𤖅 ，酢𤖅也。从水，將省聲。𤕯，古文𤖅省。」《周禮‧天官‧酒正》：「辨四飲之物：一曰清，二曰醫，三曰漿，四曰酏。」鄭玄注：「漿，今之酨漿也。」孫詒讓正義：「案漿酨同物，纍言之則曰酨漿。蓋亦釀糟為之，但味微酢耳。」

　　「漿」可表示汁液。《楚辭‧招魂》：「胹鱉炮羔，有柘漿些。」王逸注：「取藷蔗之汁為漿飲也。」

　　「漿」也表示水或其他食物湯汁。金高仲常〈貧也樂〉：「黃埃赤日長安道，倦客無漿馬無草。」

　　「漿」還表示衣物洗凈後，浸以米汁，乾後使之平挺。《西游記》第48回：「你且放心，與我們漿漿衣服，曬曬關文。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「將」聲，本義為釀製的酸味飲品。

漿字的基本解释

漿
jiāng

漿
jiàng
均见“浆”。

漿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》即良切，平陽，精。］
“浆1”的繁体字。
(1)古代一种微酸的饮料。
(2)借指卖浆之家。
(3)汁液。
(4)指水或其他食物汤汁。
(5)衣物洗净后，浸以米汁，干后使之平挺。
(6)粘着。
[②]［jiàng］
“浆2”的繁体字。同“糨1”。

漿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漿； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页648第07
〔古文〕?【唐韻】卽良切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】資良切，?音將。【說文】本作將，酢漿也。一曰水米汁相將也。【周禮·天官·酒正】辨四飮之物，三曰漿。又?漿，水名。【水經注】芍陂東注?漿水。　又寒漿，草名，葴也。見【爾雅·釋草】。　又【周禮註】蚌曰合漿，亦曰含漿。

漿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
漿字的起名意思

暂无。

(1) A slightly acidic beverage in ancient times.

(3) Juice.
(4) Refers to water or other food soups.
(5) After washing the clothes, soak them in rice juice and make them flat after drying.
(6) Adhesion.
